taskDescription:
Perform a comprehensive code cleanup analysis:
1. Identify unused components, pages, and services
2. Check for deprecated code and outdated dependencies
3. Document all findings in a detailed report
4. Flag any potentially risky removals that need review
5. Create a list of recommended deletions
workflowContext: We need to clean up the codebase by removing unused and outdated code. This is a collaborative effort where Olga will analyze and identify cleanup targets, and I (Zara) will review and implement the changes safely.

workflowTemplate.name: Comprehensive System Health Check
workflowTemplate.description: Quick but thorough validation of all system components including technical, business, and user interface aspects
coordinationSteps: 1. Initialize workflow and assign tasks to agents
2. Monitor agent progress and task completion
5. Validate success criteria and compile results
successCriteria: All assigned agents respond and acknowledge their tasks
All expected deliverables are provided by agents
No blocking errors or failures in task execution
zara provides: API endpoint health check
victoria provides: Core business flow validation
aria provides: UI component status check
aria provides: User experience flow validation
